response.original_title: ‘Namegan’s Om Dlu’wans Awinagwisex—We Are One with the Land
response.overview: Comprising a network of lands, rivers, waters, and islands in the northern region of Vancouver Island, the ancestral territory of the ​‘Na̱mǥis First Nation has sustained and defined its people, in their spirit, song, and dance, for thousands of years. The existential bond between this place and its stewards is celebrated in Cranmer’s empowering short documentary.
response.title: ‘Namegan’s Om Dlu’wans Awinagwisex—We Are One with the Land
